      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backupDatabase()
      Invokes backup database.
      private void backupPostgreSQLDatabase()
      Backup the PostgreSQL database using *pg_dump* command After the backup finishes use ZipUtil.pack(File, File) to zip the directory and deletes the temporary directory
      private java.lang.String createBackupURL()
      Use backup.home system variable, if exists, as homedir for backups If backup.home does not exist try using user.dir
      private java.lang.String createBackupURL(java.lang.String backupPath)
      Gets the URL (directory/file) of the backupPath and adds as suffix DATABASENAME at the end.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostgresqlDatabaseBackupService

        public PostgresqlDatabaseBackupService()

    • Method Detail

      • backupDatabase

        public void backupDatabase()
        Invokes backup database. This is invoked by Spring Scheduled We use a cron format and invoke it every day at 21:00 server time. That should be a good time for backup for both EST and CET

      • createBackupURL

        private java.lang.String createBackupURL(java.lang.String backupPath)
        Gets the URL (directory/file) of the backupPath and adds as suffix DATABASENAME at the end.
        Parameters:
        backupPath - the parent directory for the backup
        Returns:
        the backup url to be used by the backup procedure

      • createBackupURL

        private java.lang.String createBackupURL()
        Use backup.home system variable, if exists, as homedir for backups If backup.home does not exist try using user.dir
        Returns:
        the backupURL

      • backupPostgreSQLDatabase

        private void backupPostgreSQLDatabase()
        Backup the PostgreSQL database using *pg_dump* command After the backup finishes use ZipUtil.pack(File, File) to zip the directory and deletes the temporary directory
        See Also:
        createBackupURL(String)
